title: PreciousMetapsICT
author: PreciousMetapsICT
content: Peel some ballets and get ready to buy… lol. Just figured I’d share a great auction for everyone to watch. https://www.greatcollections.com/Coin/1367702/2012-10-BTC-Casascius-Bitcoin-Silver-Coin-PCGS-SP-69

comments.author: OgNasty
comments.body: Interesting one to watch for sure. I’ll have to try and remember to see the final sales price. It seems to currently be starting with the BTC value. At the current exchange rate, I wouldn’t be surprised to see this coin sell for as much as $400,000. That’s around where I’d become an interested seller if I was looking to sell this coin.

comments.author: krogothmanhattan
comments.body: Wow....that is an amazing collection to behold...and to sell BitBills encapsulated and graded as well....amazing.    I only wish I had that kind of BTC to be able to even go near this incredible auction!    I am sure there is a whale out there that has this in their sites!    Thanks for sharing bro!  I cannot wait to see what the market brings to these Bitbills...I believe this is the first time they have    ever been offered outside this forum besides ebay!

comments.author: BitcoinPenny
comments.body: I've wanted a peeled Cas 10 for a long while now. Loaded is beyond my means. Congrats to the new owner, tho.Regards,Chris

comments.author: krogothmanhattan
comments.body: Quote from: BitcoinPenny on May 27, 2023, 11:02:28 PMI've wanted a peeled Cas 10 for a long while now. Loaded is beyond my means. Congrats to the new owner, tho.Regards,Chris   Welcome to the long list of people wanting this...the only time I ever saw one for sale was a beaten up one Ebay.   Never saw one offered anywhere else. A peeled 10 Cas silver is desirable but the silver gilt is the one that I would want for sure.   It would go very nicely next to the 1 BTC silver gilt

comments.author: bavicrypto
comments.body: Quote from: krogothmanhattan on May 27, 2023, 07:11:29 PM   Wow....that is an amazing collection to behold...and to sell BitBills encapsulated and graded as well....amazing.    I only wish I had that kind of BTC to be able to even go near this incredible auction!    I am sure there is a whale out there that has this in their sites!    Thanks for sharing bro!  I cannot wait to see what the market brings to these Bitbills...I believe this is the first time they have    ever been offered outside this forum besides ebay!Those are literally the HOLY GRAILS of physical bitcoin collecting. Interesting to see what these go for. They don’t pop op every day, that’s for sure.

comments.author: krogothmanhattan
comments.body: Quote from: bavicrypto on May 28, 2023, 08:53:02 AMQuote from: krogothmanhattan on May 27, 2023, 07:11:29 PM   Wow....that is an amazing collection to behold...and to sell BitBills encapsulated and graded as well....amazing.    I only wish I had that kind of BTC to be able to even go near this incredible auction!    I am sure there is a whale out there that has this in their sites!    Thanks for sharing bro!  I cannot wait to see what the market brings to these Bitbills...I believe this is the first time they have    ever been offered outside this forum besides ebay!Those are literally the HOLY GRAILS of physical bitcoin collecting. Interesting to see what these go for. They don’t pop op every day, that’s for sure.  Indeed....they are the HOLY GRAILS!  I am fortunate to have full sets of the Bitbills....albeit they are redeemed...they are the prized possession of my collection.  I can only dream of having the purchasing power to have them loaded...maybe someday if I ever hit the lotto!
